p: For systemic in vivo CD8 + T cell depletion, published protocols [ 71, 72] were adopted as follows. BALB/c mice were i.p. injected with 200 μg anti-CD8α (αCD8: clone: YTS 169.4) or isotype antibody (Rat IgG2b: clone: LTF-2; Bio X Cell) one day before IAV challenge. To deplete mucosal CD8 + T cells in the lungs, BALB/c mice were i.n. administered 10 μg αCD8 or IgG2b in 20 μl of PBS one day before IAV challenge [ 40].
